[Note: more of a tech demo, largely unfinished, will continue to work through Monday on it, rate accordingly.]

Post Submit Update 1:

  • Fixed collision issues
  • Hooked up animations
  • Spawned player correctly, instead of inside the vehicle
  • Placed some props, both static and with physics
  • Added damageable component to the player

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Interact (try it on the vehicle!)
  • Debug: Shift + Left Click - Spawn Zombie (or something else...if you died)
